content:
Hi all,
As raised by @Julian Gautier in this issue https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/11028, some of the links in the guides are (were in this case, :) thanks!) broken.
It would be a good task for the group to work on recommandation to check the links of the website automatically, rather if feasible (and reasonable) during deployments (Has it been done for other websites in the community ?) or planning regular checks e.g. some time before every releases with manually launched tools such as https://validator.w3.org/checklink :grinning:
What do you think ?
Yes, some sort of automatic check would be great.
